title: Apple is actively removing outdated apps from the App Store, even if theyâ€™re fully functional
content:
Enforcing strict guidelines in app stores can be a double-edged sword. On one hand, users bump into fewer low-quality software. On the other, developers have to tick endless checkboxes and sometimes deal with unnecessary hassles to satisfy our tech overlords. Apple is notorious for its relatively harsh app review process. The company sometimes rejects submissions

The post Apple is actively removing outdated apps from the App Store, even if they’re fully functional appeared first on XDA.
description: Apple is emailing developers of outdated apps, stating that it will be removing their apps from the App Store if they don't update them.
